name: Color Fight
description:
Welcome on Color Fight's page. In this game, 

You embody a little ghost called Spirit. Someone has stolen his chest and its content : the colors coin : 

The world has almost lost all its colors, and it's your role to find them back. 

Jump by pressing up to bring them all to your chest at this top lef of the map and win the game.  

Unfortunately, it's not as easy as it look, your path will be strewn with pitfalls and jumping will cost you colors(1 jump = 1 color).

If you're a good player : there is a golden key at the right of the map which open a golden extra chest located behind your chest. 

I wish you good luck, may Spirit fill his chest back

(Share your highscores ! :D)

clue : use double jump !!
